tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title TEXT,
  publication_author TEXT,
  publication_date DATE,
  citation_count INT,
  collaborators TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_id INT,
  citing_publication_id INT,
  citation_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Publications(publication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (citing_publication_id) REFERENCES Publications(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Collaborations (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_id INT,
  collaborator_name VARCHAR(255),
  collaboration_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Publications(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE publications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    citation_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author1_id INT,
    author2_id INT,
    collaboration_start_date DATE,
    collaboration_end_date DATE
);
